docs.snippet: Seen but not heard?     Michelle Obama joined Senator Barack Obama at a rally on Sunday, but she did not speak. That was hardly unusual, particularly because Senator Joseph R. Biden Jr. was on hand to introduce the man at the top of the Democratic...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seen but not heard? Michelle Obama joined Senator Barack Obama at a rally on Sunday, but she did not speak. That was hardly unusual, particularly because Senator Joseph R. Biden Jr. was on hand to introduce the man at the top of the Democratic ticket.

docs.snippet: U.S. President Donald Trump's administration will begin rolling back Obama-era environmental regulations in an "aggressive way" as soon as next week, the head of the Environmental Protection Agency said on Saturday - adding he understood why some ...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Donald Trump's administration will begin rolling back Obama-era environmental regulations in an "aggressive way" as soon as next week, the head of the Environmental Protection Agency said on Saturday - adding he understood why some Americans want to see his agency eliminated completely.
